entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
